title: MyRadioOff
content:
My pixel 2 does not connect to the network, cellular radio is off. I checked phone status with the code *#*#4636#*#*, I see that the radio is off and cannot turn it on. 
Already tried factory reset, nothing works...

I noticed similar issue was discussed in the following thread:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/8505712?hl=en

Has anyone found a solution to this issue?
